message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. To kick off the negotiations, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $11,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
